description.narrative: Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - Social Affairs - Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - emergency relief

This activity (Procurement and logistics for Ebola Care Units in Sierra Leone) is a component of Ebola Care Units in Sierra Leone reported by DFID, with a funding type of 'Humanitarian assistance' and a budget of £7,816,314. This component benefits Sierra Leone, and works in the following sector(s): Relief co-ordination and support services. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited, Finnah Holding Company Ltd, International Procurement Agency. The start date is 15-10-2014 and the end date is 14-10-2015.
